style.name: aniblackle
style.title: Aniblackle
style.creator: Der Idiot
style.description: Style inspired by blackle.com

style.name: aniblackle-menu
style.title: Aniblackle with Menu
style.creator: Der Idiot
style.description: Style inspired by blackle; banner by fafnir aka permidion

style.name: anidbstyle
style.title: AniDBstyle
style.creator: akujin
style.description: Generally aims to emulate the old table layout as closely as possible, but with much looser underlying markup. Converted to css by Rar,PetriW and epoximator.

style.name: anidbstyle2
style.title: AniDBstyle v2
style.creator: Der Idiot
style.description: a combination of the anigoogle framework and anidbstyle

style.name: anidbstyle_hacks
style.title: AniDBstyle Hacks
style.creator: Amour
style.description: hacks for the default css (IE7 compatibility)

style.name: anidbstyle_diebuster
style.title: AniDBstyle
style.creator: edokun
style.description: based on anidbstyle

style.name: anidbstyle-dongato
style.title: AniDB Style DonGato's revision
style.creator: DonGato
style.description: it only works well with Firefox (sorry don't have any more time to spend with IE/Opera)

style.name: anigoogle
style.title: Anigoogle
style.creator: Der Idiot
style.description: Style inspired by Google.

style.name: anigoogle-menu
style.title: Anigoogle with Menu
style.creator: Der Idiot
style.description: Style inspired by google (originally); banner by edekock

style.name: anitube
style.title: Anitube
style.creator: Der Idiot
style.description: Style inspired by Youtube.

style.name: cdbstyle
style.title: CDBstyle
style.creator: CDB-Man
style.description: CDB`s improvements on DerIdiot`s AniDBstyle2. Contains ergonomics updates, such as: increased gradients, additional mylist entry colour highlighting, reduced whitespace, etc. More info: http://wiki.anidb.net/w/User:CDB-Man/CDBstyle and http://anidb.net/post363796

style.name: dark-style
style.title: Dark Style
style.creator: sylwira
style.description: Firefox only. (Works also in Opera, but not so well. Don't even try it with IE :D )

style.name: fma_style
style.title: Fullmetal Alchemist Style
style.creator: jkaze
style.description: Viewing some Fullmetal Alchemist characters in the top, with simple design!

style.name: foursquare
style.title: Foursquare
style.creator: Vaneska
style.description: A Grey and White Theme with Customized Icons, based on Sub Brown 2.

style.name: geassmode
style.title: Geass Mode
style.creator: antennen
style.description: Aiming to be a clean and usable design. Banner features C.C. and Kallen from Code Geass.

style.name: grey
style.title: Grey
style.creator: zeromind
style.description: It's mainly grey and uses images (some with transparency) for texturising the backgrounds and Arial Unicode MS/Arial for text.

style.name: grey_r2
style.title: grey r2
style.creator: zeromind
style.description: It's grey, and stuff. Requires at least Firefox 3.5 (or any other browser that supports hsla color definitions) to look properly.

style.name: haruhistylex
style.title: HaruhiStyleX.AniDB
style.creator: TheJAG
style.status: not maintained anymore and replaced by v2
style.description: NOTE! This style contains adult content. HaruhiStyleX.AniDB is developed for Opera at a resolution of 1280x1024 and may not work in any other webbrowser or lower resolutions. (Based on Harustyle by b1hn.)

style.name: harustyle
style.title: Harustyle
style.creator: b1nh
style.description: Completely recoded based on epox' gray css. Everything should work now.

style.name: luckystyle
style.title: LuckyStyle
style.creator: Breadstone
style.description: Thanks to B1nhs help i've finally completed my LuckyStyle. I hope you guys (and gals) like it. If you find any bugs or something you think

style.name: sub-kfuaw
style.title: sub-kfuaw
style.creator: noec
style.description: Very simple style mostly using grey colors.

style.name: zakura-menu
style.title: sub-zakura-menu
style.creator: fahrenheit
style.description: Based on Zakura by Zak and Nice-day by Epoximator
